name: PepeLine Adventures
description:
Let's begin a very exciting journey to help Pepe and Line meet again. Because of the wicked witch, they have been lost in a fairy world.

PepeLine Adventures is the sequel to our hit game PepeLine and belongs to the genre of Pipeline Puzzle games. Yes, we know that there are tons of these games in the store, but PepeLine Adventures has 100% unique gameplay never seen before, plus beautiful 3D environment with 2 lovely characters (Pepe and Line).

HOW TO PLAY
* Tap on a tile and slide it to the direction you want to move
* Use Rubik's cube algorithm to complete a path
* Challenge 3 stars on all levels by achieving target steps
* For advanced players: complete the path in less steps and get a medal
* Be aware some tiles have different behavior

FEATURES
* Beautiful 3D Game Art!
* Easy & unique gameplay for both children and adults
* Pile of levels for hours and days of fun
* 6 different fairy islands
* Extra tiles for major challenge
* In-game functions (Undo, Hints, Restart)
* Leaderboards & Achievements
* Daily Reward
* New and more levels constantly
